title: Transportation: Buying Tickets (Usefulness 5-10)
description: Traveler usefulness 5-10/10 phrases for the Buying Tickets subcategory within Transportation. Includes 7 card(s).

cards.english: One ticket to Narita Airport, please.
cards.romaji: Narita kuko made no kippu o ichi-mai kudasai.
cards.japanese: 成田空港までの切符を一枚ください。

cards.english: Two tickets to Narita Airport, please.
cards.romaji: Narita kuko made no kippu o ni mai kudasai.
cards.japanese: 成田空港までの切符を二枚ください。

cards.english: A ticket to Tokyo Station, please.
cards.romaji: Tokyo eki made no kippu o kudasai.
cards.japanese: 東京駅までの切符をください。

cards.english: One ticket to Tokyo Station please.
cards.romaji: Tokyo eki made no kippu wo ichi-mai kudasai.
cards.japanese: 東京駅までの切符を一枚ください。

cards.romaji: Osaka eki made no kippu o kudasai.
cards.japanese: 大阪駅までの切符をください。
